query:
SELECT u.id as userId, u.name, u.email, a.id as accountId, a.storeName, a.marketplace,
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM daily_performance dp WHERE dp.accountId = a.id) as perfCount,
       (SELECT SUM(spend) FROM daily_performance dp WHERE dp.accountId = a.id) as totalSpend
FROM users u 
LEFT JOIN ad_accounts a ON a.userId = u.id
WHERE a.id IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY u.id, a.id;
